name: C(hinese)E(nglish)M(aths) Adventure
description:
Students who study in primary school need to prepare for their admired secondary school. They are assigned much homework and attended many tutorials. As a result, stress is caused and affects students. It may lead bad results such as students run away from home or unwilling to study.

This game is designed for primary school students. Let them can relax during playing the game because children like playing games. Players need to answer Chinese, English and Maths questions and finish the stage mission in order to win the game. That can improve player Chinese, English and Maths ability. The message is telling the students that although it is very difficult and stressful on their study, it can help their future lives.

Game Story: 

In FE0196, Martin graduated at ABC Secondary School with First Honours award and became a famous student in Hong Kong. He can get a qualification to study abroad in a high technology city called ABC(Automatically Bytes Common) city and study in ABC Science and Technology University(ASTU). During his study, he made many major scientific research results. 

In FE0200, he can get a First Honours Degree graduate in Bachelor of Science (Honours) Information and Communications Technology with 4.0 CGPA. Make the Earth Federation Government and many scientific research organizations pay attention to him. Then invite him to develop an AI Government Computer for ABC city to help the ABC Government to manage the city and do an experiment.

In FE0205, AI Government Computer was completed by Martin. However, AI Government Computer is out of control. The computer replaces a human leader as a leader of ABC city and controls everything. Martin also cannot control the computer. Then he tried to send a format command to the computer. But the format command program has been divided into 3 parts and sent to C(hinese)E(nglish)M(aths) Dimension. To save the ABC city, he has to enter CEM Dimension to find 3 parts and recombine them.

CEM Dimension has divided 3 subject spaces: Chinese, English and Maths. Each program part is kept by the boss of each subject space. Martin needs to use subject knowledge learned at school to complete the mission.
